root: ^Hello there travler, I see you've come to raid the ruins. I must warn you, there is a dangerous beast roaming about. I ask of you to heed my warning but if you do plan to delve deeper into the unknown could you do me a favor, I would be ever most greatful.

c-0: ^I left a very powerful weapon in there as I was trying to flee from the beast within. It was something passed down to me. Do you think you could retrieve it for me?
^Yes. Please return it to me when you come back.
